channel.title: Airspace for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content on Airspace for Hugo

item.title: How Project Colony Works
item.description: How does Project Colony Work Create a project See your current projects on the project page. Add Project You can simply add a project by clicking ‘Add Project’. The project creates a new colony on the etherium blockchain. Project Details Double click on a project to see its details. In the project details you can change the project name and the project description. On top you can see and add tasks to your project.

item.title: Privacy Terms
item.description: This is an example deployment and public to everyone Your IP address is stored inside log files within the European Union. Those logs files are removed automatically after maximum a month. Don’t enter any personal information or anything you are not allowed to publish. You are responsible for what you publish. This is an example deployment, and is not intended for usage. Please don’t enter information into this app.

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.description: This is an example deployment and public to everyone. You are solely responsible yourself by visiting this app. No guarantess are given/made.
